alert.note: Alert for Hennepin; Sherburne; Wright (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 3:41PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Hennepin, northeastern Wright and southeastern Sherburne Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 341 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Monticello, or 11 miles north of Buffalo, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Monticello and Big Lake around 345 PM CDT. Buffalo around 350 PM CDT. Albertville around 400 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include St. Michael, Otsego, Rogers, Maple Grove and Corcoran. This includes the following highways... Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 185 and 205. U.S. Highway 10 in Minnesota between mile markers 197 and 217. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
